title: 107_s1553
content: Economic Stimulus Through Bonus Depreciation Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a 50 percent bonus (first-year) deduction for qualified business property acquired or contracted for between September 11, 2001 and July 1, 2002, and placed in service before January 1, 2003. Sets forth related provisions respecting: (1) alternative depreciation property, (2) original use, and (3) alternative minimum tax.
